title: Affordable 1 & 2 Bedroom at 7425-31 S. Coles Avenue
app_fee: credit check fee $40.00, move in fee $350
posting_body: California Style Complex within walking distance of Lake Michigan and public transportation currently has one bedroom apartments available.
All apartments include refrigerator, stove, air-conditioner, carpeting, and blinds.
Each apartment includes FREE HEAT and FREE COOKING GAS.
1 Bedroom $725 --  $350 Move-In Fee after Application is approved -- no security deposit.
2 Bedroom $850  -- $500 Move-In Fee after Application is approved -- no security deposit.
$40 non-refundable Fee for Credit and Background check.
WE WELCOME YOU TO COME SEE OUR APARTMENTS.
If you would like to set up an appointment call:
Hours:     Monday through Friday 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m
You can also check us out on Facebook, our website kalabichmgmt.com, search for Kalabich virtual apartment tours at Youtube.com or go to Twitter(@KalabichMgmt).
